oai_dc:dc.dc:title: UK organic research funding – scope and aims
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Costigan, Peter
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Research methodology and philosophy
"Organics" in general
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This report was presented at the UK Organic Research 2002 Conference. This paper outlines the development of the research programme, describing its rationale and objectives, and providing an indication of likely future priorities.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Organic Centre Wales, Institute of Rural Studies, University of Wales Aberystwyth
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Costigan, Peter (2002) UK organic research funding – scope and aims. In: Powell, Jane and et al., (Eds.) Proceedings of the UK Organic Research 2002 Conference, Organic Centre Wales, Institute of Rural Studies, University of Wales Aberystwyth, pp. 1-6.
